frame.name: Scarcity
frame.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Quantity</fen> of a <fen>Collection</fen> occurring in a <fen>Place</fen> has a particular <fen>Measure</fen>, which is related to the amount generally needed.
<ex>There is evidence that <fex name="Collection">volatile materials</fex> have <fex name="Time">always</fex> been <t>scarce</t> <fex name="Place">on the Moon</fex> .</ex>
<ex>A global effort to tackle <fex name="Collection">water</fex> <t>scarcity</t> is getting underway. <fex name="pla">INI</fex></ex>
<ex>It is the <t>scarceness</t> <fex name="Collection">of these precious metals</fex> that adds to their luster. <fex name="pla">INI</fex></ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Collection
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Collection</fen> whose <fen>Quantity</fen> is under consideration.
<ex>Relax, <fex name="col">oil supplies</fex> <m>are</m> <t>plentiful</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Quantity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The feature of an <fen>Collection</fen> which is under discussion. This FE is incorporated by all the lexical units in this frame.
<ex>The majority of specimens were poorly represented, as judged by the small size of mature plants, the immaturity of thalli or <t>scarceness</t> <fex name="qua">in occurrence</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the <fen>Measure</fen> from the norm or from the value for another <fen>Collection</fen>.
<ex>Iron is <fex name="deg">very</fex> <t>scarce</t> inside the human body, so pneumococcal bacteria have mechanisms to obtain iron more easily.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Collection</fen> is in the state of having a particular <fen>Measure</fen> for the <fen>Quantity</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Time">These days</fex> food is <t>plentiful</t> and easy to get and physical activity is no longer a part of daily life.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Some specification of the circumstances under which the <fen>Collection</fen> has a particular <fen>Measure</fen> for the <fen>Quantity</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Measure
FE.definition: <def-root>The measure of the <fen>Quantity</fen>, which is incorporated by the lexical units.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location in which the <fen>Collection</fen> occurs.
<ex>Northern Pike are <t>plentiful</t> <fex name="pla">in Perrault Lake</fex>.</ex></def-root>
